name: nuxt-toc
description: A nuxt.js module for Table of Contents (TOC)
author: hanyujie2002

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
